overview_of_class: CHINESE 211 is a year-long intermediate-level course, designed to further develop students' communicative competence in listening, speaking, reading and writing in modern Chinese as well as to deepen understanding of Chinese culture and social issues. Student-centered communicative activities will follow instructor-led introduction to lesson vocabulary and sentence structures. Students will learn the use of the language for description and comparison through various tasks and activities. Chinese is the means of instruction. Upon satisfactory completion of the whole sequence course, students are expected to reach Intermediate-High level of the ACTFL proficiency guidelines.
name: Chinese III
subject: CHINESE
